briefdescription.para: execute a srmv2 request sync "GET" on the srm_ifce

memberdef.name: gfal_srm_getTURLS_catalog

detaileddescription.para: simple wrapper to getTURLs for the gfal_module layer

briefdescription.para: launch a surls-> turls translation in the synchronous mode

parameterdescription.para: : tab of string, last char* must be NULL

simplesect.para: return positive if success else -1, check GError for more information
